proposals.example: How far had Morino lived in America? (far -> long)
proposals.gesture: Use the index and thumb to select, then strike with the right index to delete, then typing
Use the indexes to select the text, move the whole two hands to move the text to desired position
proposals.reasons: It is logically connected to the first gesture I proposed. I use the index and thump to select a word or group words.

proposals.example: How long have her had this fever? (have her-> has she)
proposals.gesture: (Similar to replaceSingle) Use the index and thumb to select, then strike with the right index to delete, then typing
proposals.reasons: Because it is similar to replaceSingle, it is easy to perform

proposals.gesture: (Similar to reorderGroup) Use the indexes to select the text, move the whole two hands to move the text to desired position
proposals.reasons: Because I used it in reorderGroup, should be similar to reorderSingle word

proposals.example: He likes to eat healthy when visiting visiting resturants
proposals.gesture: (Similar to replaceSingle) Use the index and thumb to select, then strike with the right index to delete
proposals.reasons: I already used in previous gestures, thus it is easy to remember.

proposals.example: Tom is traveling to Berlin week (next)
proposals.gesture: Move the cursor to the position with the whole hand, then just typing

proposals.example: What took you so long so long?
proposals.gesture: (Similar to deleteSingle) use the index and thumb to select the words, then strike with the right index to delete it
proposals.reasons: It is logically connected to other gestures.

comments: I think it could be useful, probably not to all people, but many could be interested, because it could save them time and more convienent
